Come pilotare carichi grandi con una MKR1000

Bill Of Materials

  • 1# N Mosfet(IRF520)
  • 1# NPN Transistor (2n7000, BS170)
  • 1# Resistor 10 Ohm
  • 1# Resistor 33 Ohm
  • 1# Resistor 1M Ohm
  • 1# diode
